<file>
00001| @tailwind base;
00002| @tailwind components;
00003| @tailwind utilities;
00004| 
00005| :root {
00006|   --foreground-rgb: 0, 0, 0;
00007|   --background-start-rgb: 214, 219, 220;
00008|   --background-end-rgb: 255, 255, 255;
00009| }
00010| 
00011| @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
00012|   :root {
00013|     --foreground-rgb: 255, 255, 255;
00014|     --background-start-rgb: 0, 0, 0;
00015|     --background-end-rgb: 0, 0, 0;
00016|   }
00017| }
00018| 
00019| @layer base {
00020|   :root {
00021|     --background: 0 0% 100%;
00022|     --foreground: 0 0% 3.9%;
00023|     --card: 0 0% 100%;
00024|     --card-foreground: 0 0% 3.9%;
00025|     --popover: 0 0% 100%;
00026|     --popover-foreground: 0 0% 3.9%;
00027|     --primary: 0 0% 9%;
00028|     --primary-foreground: 0 0% 98%;
00029|     --secondary: 0 0% 96.1%;
00030|     --secondary-foreground: 0 0% 9%;
00031|     --muted: 0 0% 96.1%;
00032|     --muted-foreground: 0 0% 45.1%;
00033|     --accent: 0 0% 96.1%;
00034|     --accent-foreground: 0 0% 9%;
00035|     --destructive: 0 84.2% 60.2%;
00036|     --destructive-foreground: 0 0% 98%;
00037|     --border: 0 0% 89.8%;
00038|     --input: 0 0% 89.8%;
00039|     --ring: 0 0% 3.9%;
00040|     --chart-1: 12 76% 61%;
00041|     --chart-2: 173 58% 39%;
00042|     --chart-3: 197 37% 24%;
00043|     --chart-4: 43 74% 66%;
00044|     --chart-5: 27 87% 67%;
00045|     --radius: 0.5rem;
00046|   }
00047|   .dark {
00048|     --background: 0 0% 3.9%;
00049|     --foreground: 0 0% 98%;
00050|     --card: 0 0% 3.9%;
00051|     --card-foreground: 0 0% 98%;
00052|     --popover: 0 0% 3.9%;
00053|     --popover-foreground: 0 0% 98%;
00054|     --primary: 0 0% 98%;
00055|     --primary-foreground: 0 0% 9%;
00056|     --secondary: 0 0% 14.9%;
00057|     --secondary-foreground: 0 0% 98%;
00058|     --muted: 0 0% 14.9%;
00059|     --muted-foreground: 0 0% 63.9%;
00060|     --accent: 0 0% 14.9%;
00061|     --accent-foreground: 0 0% 98%;
00062|     --destructive: 0 62.8% 30.6%;
00063|     --destructive-foreground: 0 0% 98%;
00064|     --border: 0 0% 14.9%;
00065|     --input: 0 0% 14.9%;
00066|     --ring: 0 0% 83.1%;
00067|     --chart-1: 220 70% 50%;
00068|     --chart-2: 160 60% 45%;
00069|     --chart-3: 30 80% 55%;
00070|     --chart-4: 280 65% 60%;
00071|     --chart-5: 340 75% 55%;
00072|   }
00073| }
00074| 
00075| @layer base {
00076|   * {
00077|     @apply border-border;
00078|   }
00079|   body {
00080|     @apply bg-background text-foreground;
00081|   }
00082| }
00083| 
00084| /* Linguala Custom Styles */
00085| @layer components {
00086|   .linguala-gradient {
00087|     background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3B82F6 0%, #8B5CF6 50%, #06B6D4 100%);
00088|   }
00089|   
00090|   .linguala-text-gradient {
00091|     background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3B82F6 0%, #8B5CF6 50%, #06B6D4 100%);
00092|     -webkit-background-clip: text;
00093|     background-clip: text;
00094|     -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
00095|   }
00096|   
00097|   .linguala-blur-bg {
00098|     background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95);
00099|     backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
00100|     -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
00101|   }
00102|   
00103|   .linguala-card-hover {
00104|     transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
00105|   }
00106|   
00107|   .linguala-card-hover:hover {
00108|     transform: translateY(-2px);
00109|     box-shadow: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 10px 10px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);
00110|   }
00111|   
00112|   .linguala-button {
00113|     background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3B82F6 0%, #8B5CF6 100%);
00114|     transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
00115|   }
00116|   
00117|   .linguala-button:hover {
00118|     background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2563EB 0%, #7C3AED 100%);
00119|     transform: translateY(-1px);
00120|     box-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.5);
00121|   }
00122|   
00123|   .linguala-animate-in {
00124|     animation: linguala-slide-up 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
00125|   }
00126|   
00127|   @keyframes linguala-slide-up {
00128|     from {
00129|       opacity: 0;
00130|       transform: translateY(20px);
00131|     }
00132|     to {
00133|       opacity: 1;
00134|       transform: translateY(0);
00135|     }
00136|   }
00137|   
00138|   .linguala-shimmer {
00139|     background: linear-gradient(
00140|       110deg,
00141|       transparent 40%,
00142|       rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) 50%,
00143|       transparent 60%
00144|     );
00145|     background-size: 200% 100%;
00146|     animation: linguala-shimmer 2s infinite;
00147|   }
00148|   
00149|   @keyframes linguala-shimmer {
00150|     0% {
00151|       background-position: 200% 0;
00152|     }
00153|     100% {
00154|       background-position: -200% 0;
00155|     }
00156|   }
00157|   
00158|   .linguala-pulse {
00159|     animation: linguala-pulse 2s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.6, 1) infinite;
00160|   }
00161|   
00162|   @keyframes linguala-pulse {
00163|     0%, 100% {
00164|       opacity: 1;
00165|     }
00166|     50% {
00167|       opacity: 0.7;
00168|     }
00169|   }
00170|   
00171|   /* Enhanced Focus States */
00172|   .linguala-focus {
00173|     @apply focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:outline-none;
00174|   }
00175|   
00176|   /* Custom Scrollbar */
00177|   .linguala-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar {
00178|     width: 8px;
00179|   }
00180|   
00181|   .linguala-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
00182|     background: rgb(241, 245, 249);
00183|     border-radius: 4px;
00184|   }
00185|   
00186|   .linguala-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
00187|     background: linear-gradient(135deg, #3B82F6, #8B5CF6);
00188|     border-radius: 4px;
00189|   }
00190|   
00191|   .linguala-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
00192|     background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2563EB, #7C3AED);
00193|   }
00194| }
00195| 
</file>
